item.title: CVE-2024-32530|2024-04-17T09:32:48.579Z -- PressTigers -- Simple Testimonials Showcase
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PressTigers Simple Testimonials Showcase allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Testimonials Showcase: from n/a through 1.1.5.
